title: Game keeps crashing.
body: After I downloaded the patch I started up a ranked game just for it to crash as soon as it hit the loading screen, luckily my teammates remade it so they didnt lose anything. I rescanned the files it told me to do and restarted my computer just to make sure. Hopped back on to start up another for it to happen again. I have lost 40 LP now because your game keeps freaking crashing on me and I DONT KNOW WHY. Can I get that LP back that I lost because of your game and can someone help me fix this problem since it cant fix it self apparently. Sorry for angry typing but well Im angry.

replies.body: I've played 3 other games before the client begin crashing, you can even view my match history riot on lolking. This bug splat window pops u now "opps something broke" yea something @ Riot THX. Custom games don't work, going on a different accounts doesn't work, still crashing like Jesus.

This is likely due to an unstable connection to the LoL servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
Hmmmmmmmm. This sounds like we got a loooong wait.  Migration to another might be a viable option...... Will try it !!!

LP is not something that can be restored or adjusted, but I'd like to help you resolve this so you can get back in the game.  Can you provide some more details on your issue, such as any error messages you are receiving?  Do you see anything on your screen during the crash, and at what point exactly is it happening?  If you need to reproduce any of this, please do it in a custom game to prevent further penalties.  Looking forward to help you out!

Its happening a lot, and it effectively ends your LoL participation. I still cannot connect. Tried everything described here. Repair, full re-install etc.

Do I have to wait until patch 6.16?
